### Changed
- Add `giantswarm.io/managed-by` label so apps are accepted by `app-admission-controller`.
- Remove `app-operator.giantswarm.io/version` label as its replaced by `giantswarm.io/cluster`.
- Update `aws-cni` app to `0.2.1`.
